Question: Shenzhen Do Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Do Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

Product 1: ID Sport01 Smart Watch

 - Amazon Alexa Built-in function
 - Battery life up to 7 days
 - 100 sports modes
 - 3 application themes
 - 100+ Cloud Dials
 - Supports Bluetooth Call
 - Heart Rate Monitoring
 - Sleep Monitoring
